mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rownumber FROM ( select classid, classname, ESTABLISHMENTDATE, mainTeacherName, withTeacherName, nurserygovernessName, usercount, schoolname, COUNT(*) OVER() COUNTNUMBER from (select c.classid, c.classname, c.establishmentdate, tc.userid, u.name as mainTeacherName, tcp.userid, up.name as withTeacherName, tcb.userid, ub.name as nurserygovernessName, nvl(uc.userCount, 0) as usercount, s.schoolname from ib_classinfo c left join ib_classinforelation cr on cr.classid = c.classid left join ib_teacherinclass tc on tc.classid = c.classid and tc.type = 1 left join ib_userinfo u on u.userid = tc.userid left join ib_teacherinclass tcp on tcp.classid = c.classid and tcp.type = 2 left join ib_userinfo up on up.userid = tcp.userid left join ib_teacherinclass tcb on tcb.classid = c.classid and tcb.type = 3 left join ib_userinfo ub on ub.userid = tcb.userid left join (select count(*) AS userCount, ClassId from ib_UserInClass group by ClassId) uc on uc.classid = c.classid left join ib_classinforelation csr on csr.classid = c.classid left join ib_schoolinfo s on s.schoolid = csr.schoolid where cr.schoolid = #{schoolId}) q )a WHERE rownum <= #{endNumber jdbcType=INTEGER} ) b WHERE b.rownumber >= #{startNumber jdbcType=INTEGER}
select l.classId As classId, l.className As className, l.classStyle As classStyle from ib_classinfo l where l.classId=#{classId}
select l.classId AS classId, l.type AS type, l.userId AS userId, t.name AS name from ib_TEACHERINCLASS l left join ib_USERINFO t on t.userId = l.userId where classId=#{classId} and type='1'
select l.classId AS classId, l.type AS type, l.userId AS userId, t.name AS name from ib_TEACHERINCLASS l left join ib_USERINFO t on t.userId = l.userId where classId=#{classId} and type='2'
select l.classId AS classId, l.type AS type, l.userId AS userId, t.name AS name from ib_TEACHERINCLASS l left join ib_USERINFO t on t.userId = l.userId where classId=#{classId} and type='3'
select l.classCode, l.deleteFlg from ib_classinfo l where l.deleteFlg='0' and l.classCode=#{classCode}

select l.classId, l.className, l.deleteFlg, t.schoolId from ib_classinfo l left join ib_CLASSINFORELATION t on l.classId=t.classId where l.deleteFlg='0' and t.schoolId=#{schoolId} and l.classname=#{className} and l.classId<>#{classId}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_CLASSINFO.nextval from dual
insert into ib_CLASSINFO(classId,classCode,classStyle,className,establishmentDate,schoolingLength, deleteFlg,creationTime,createdBy,lastupdateTime,lastupdatedBy) values(#{classId},#{classCode},#{classStyle},#{className},#{establishmentDate},#{schoolingLength}, '0',#{creationTime},#{createdBy},#{lastupdateTime},#{lastupdatedBy})
mapper.select: select l.userId as userId, l.classId as classId, l.organizationId as organizationId from ib_USERINCLASS l where l.classId=#{classId} and l.organizationId=#{organizationId}
select l.userId as userId, l.classId as classId, l.type as type, l.organizationId as organizationId from ib_TEACHERINCLASS l where l.classId=#{classId} and l.type='0'
mapper.delete: delete ib_TEACHERINCLASS l where l.classId=#{classId} and type<>'0'
mapper.select: select l.userid, l.organizationId, l.organizationtype, l.isadmin, ul.nickName, ul.photourl from ib_USERINORG l left join ib_UserInfo ul on l.userid=ul.userid where l.userid=#{userId}
